text:
I have a onmouseover event handler on the outermost <svg> element that looks 
at the 'class' attribute of the event target to decide what to do.  If I have 
a <rect> element that is an immediate child of the <svg> element, the event 
handler is able to see the rect's 'class' attribute [using getAttribute
('class')].  However, if I put the same <rect> inside an <a> element, the 
event handler suddenly can no longer see the 'class' attribute [getAttribute
('class')==""].

Other attributes, like 'id', are not lost in this case.
creator: cybersam@alum.rpi.edu
